name: Unleash Tyrannosaurus
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You summon a tyrannosaurus to an empty space within range that you can see. It takes its turn after yours and obeys your mental orders.

Creatures summoned by this spell count as beasts in addition to their normal typing. They are treated as reanimated creatures.

Casting this spell again causes the previous tyrannosaurus to vanish.
